Hi Sarah, 

Most likely this is a caching issue. With that, I cleared the site's cache on our system. Could you also please clear your browser's cache to make sure that you will see the latest version of the site?

@rica done rechecking amsls page in my mobile, also I asked glen too to check on his end, it was all good now, please check to your mobile too. and let me know if the issue still exist. Thanks ✋

Screenshot
@jaime could you please check? most likely a caching issue however just to make sure kindly check

Sadly on my Android phone when at the tab "Become a participant", I am still seeing the page Jayme sent through initially?

Regards
